availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Colby E. Barry (Monroe County, KY, county court judge)

body.p: Monroe County, Kentucky, county court judge. Tennessee native. Son of Francis Barry. Married to Nancy W. Hill Barry. Father of Mary Barry, Sarah Barry, Virginia B. Barry, Ophelia Barry, Milton C. Barry, Cornelia Barry, and Joseph Barry. Farmer in Monroe County, Kentucky, in 1850. County court judge of Monroe county in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Monroe County, p. 393A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Monroe County, p. 7.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994049, Monroe County Births, p. 1.
